comments: Denominators of coefficients of the Taylor series of sinh(sqrt(2*x))/(sqrt(2*x)). - J. Zurita (jrzurita(AT)inaoep.mx), Dec 01 2007
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..90
L. Carlitz, The inverse of the error function, Pacific J. Math., 13 (1963), 459-470.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Inverse Erf
maple: a[1]:=1:for n from 2 to 50 do a[n]:=a[n-1]*(2*n-1)*(n-1) od: seq(a[n], n=1..14); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 08 2008
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
